meanings.sent1: She skiddooed out of the room when she heard the loud noise.
meanings.sent2: He skiddooed from the party as soon as he saw his ex-girlfriend.
meanings.sent3: The cat skiddooed away when it accidentally knocked over a vase.
meanings.sent4: The idea of going to the dentist made him skiddooed like a scared rabbit.
meanings.sent5: The children skiddooed out of the classroom when the bell rang for recess.

meanings.sent1: The thief skiddooed from the scene before anyone could catch him.
meanings.sent2: The bus skiddooed off without waiting for the late passengers.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel skiddooed up the tree when it saw the dog approaching.
meanings.sent4: Her heart skiddooed with excitement when she won the competition.
meanings.sent5: The bird skiddooed away from the approaching storm to find shelter.
